parameters.name: DefenceMode
parameters.description:
The prevention mode. Valid values:

*   **block**: Interception Mode
*   **audit**: Alert Mode

parameters.name: Dir
parameters.description: The directory that you want to protect.

parameters.name: ExclusiveDir
parameters.description:
The directory for which you want to disable web tamper proofing.

> If you set **Mode** to **blacklist**, you must specify this parameter.

parameters.name: ExclusiveFile
parameters.description:
The file for which you want to disable web tamper proofing.

> If you set **Mode** to **blacklist**, you must specify this parameter.

parameters.name: ExclusiveFileType
parameters.description:
The type of file for which you want to disable web tamper proofing. Separate multiple types with semicolons (;). Valid values:

*   php
*   jsp
*   asp
*   aspx
*   js
*   cgi
*   html
*   htm
*   xml
*   shtml
*   shtm
*   jpg
*   gif
*   png

> If you set **Mode** to **blacklist**, you must specify this parameter.

parameters.name: InclusiveFile
parameters.description:
The file for which you want to enable web tamper proofing.

> If you set **Mode** to **whitelist**, you must specify this parameter.

parameters.name: InclusiveFileType
parameters.description:
The type of file for which you want to enable web tamper proofing. Separate multiple types with semicolons (;). Valid values:

*   php
*   jsp
*   asp
*   aspx
*   js
*   cgi
*   html
*   htm
*   xml
*   shtml
*   shtm
*   jpg
*   gif
*   png

> If you set **Mode** to **whitelist**, you must specify this parameter.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: LocalBackupDir
parameters.description: The local path to the backup files of the protected directory.

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description:
The protection mode of web tamper proofing. Valid values:

*   **whitelist**: In this mode, web tamper proofing is enabled for the specified directories and file types.
*   **blacklist**: In this mode, web tamper proofing is enabled for the unspecified sub-directories, file types, and files in the protected directories.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.

parameters.name: Uuid
parameters.description:
The UUID of the server for which you want to add a directory to protect.

> You can call the [DescribeCloudCenterInstances](~~DescribeCloudCenterInstances~~) operation to query the UUIDs of servers.
